institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 32 (Establishment of Training Course)
contents: Article 32 (Establishment of new training courses) Joint training centers (limited to joint training centers that receive training expenses in accordance with the employer training refund method) provide ad-hoc training courses to the extent that no additional subsidies are incurred pursuant to Article 19 (1) of the Regulations. can be newly established. In this case, the matter must be reported to the steering committee.
